publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6827Karen Whitefield:Airdrie @Home Centre Talent Night—That the Parliament congratulates all those who participated in the Airdrie @Home Centre’s talent night, @Home’s Got Talent; commends all those involved on the high standard of their performances; pays tribute to the hard work and commitment that went into making the night a success; applauds all the staff at the Airdrie @Home Centre for organising the event, which gave the young people involved the opportunity to showcase the skills that they acquired over the summer, and acknowledges the impressive range of educational and support services that the centre continues to provide for young people in the North Lanarkshire community. Supported by: James Kelly*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Stuart McMillan*, David Stewart*, Elaine Smith*, Mary Mulligan*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Helen Eadie*, Hugh Henry*
